headline: Chief, TACCOM Maintenance Operations
summary:
PMP certified engineering professional with 18 years of critical communications and network systems experience in âzero-failureâ environments supporting DoD war fighters, Federal Law Enforcement, and the White House Community of Interest.  Expertise in vendor agnostic design, implementation, and management of various DoD tactical and Federal law enforcement communication systems to allow intermeshed, interoperable communications between land-air, mobile, and fixed base conventional and trunking systems.   

Current areas of research include: LTE wireless communications, communications network interoperability coordination and planning, Federal and Civil requirements on frequency spectrum allocation, and emerging technologies.

Specialties: Project Management
Earned Value Management
Land Mobile Radio 
Wireless Engineering
Wireless Security
Information Assurance
Wireless Interoperability
LTE

positions.description:
Sr. Systems Engineer responsible for the design, integration, and optimization of the DHS Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) P25 multicast Land Mobile Radio (LMR) infrastructure for Region 1 under the ATLAS Automation Modernization Program.

Project Manager responsible for managing resources and budget for maximum efficiencies. Implemented PMI project management best practices and principles to successfully carry out project objectives.
positions.title: Engineering Manager; Project Manager

positions.description: Project Manager for DHS ICE Gulf Coast Region TACCOM upgrade.  Responsible for managing resources and budget for maximum efficiencies of an LMR upgrade task order spanning six states with a period of performance of 18 months.  Implemented PMI project management best practices and principles to successfully carry out project objectives.
positions.title: Project Manager; Engineering Manager

positions.description: Member of the FEMA Integrated Public Alert and Warning System (IPAWS) support staff providing integration and engineering services for the implementation and testing of the Digital Emergency Alert System (DEAS) nationwide as directed under EO 13407, Function 10.
positions.title: Wireless Network Engineer

positions.description: Responsible for the engineering, installation, and operation of secure and non-secure telephone circuits, VHF / UHF radio systems, satellite communications terminals, secure video teleconferencing systems, and other ancillary equipment in a "no fail" environment. Provided worldwide support for the President, Vice President, First Lady, Senior White House staff, United States Secret Service, and the White House Military Office in this nominative/selectively manned Joint Service Agency. Performs preventive and corrective maintenance on an inventory of over 3,500 line items of communications-electronic and ancillary equipment valued at over $16.5M.
positions.title: Senior Wideband Radio Engineer

positions.description: NCOIC of COMSEC Maintenance Shop at Forward Operating Base (FOB) St. Mere, Fallujah, Iraq during Operation Iraqi Freedom (OIF2) in support of the 3rd Brigade Task Force war fighter.  Utilized TMDE to performed complex diagnoses and repair of multi-failure COMSEC equipment in accordance with NSA approved standards for CCI repairs. Provided shop Officer with equipment repair status, priorities, and necessity for bench stock resupply as well as technical and procedural assistance to subordinates by performing final quality control inspection of repaired equipment. Performs preventive maintenance checks and services (PMCS) on tools, TMDE, vehicles, and power generators and controlled and accounted for CCI within the repair facility.
positions.location: Ft. Bragg, NC, FOB St. Mere, Fallujah, Iraq
positions.title: Radio COMSEC Repairer

positions.description: Provided engineering support to Field Service Engineers servicing serum and whole blood analyzers out of the National Service Center.  Provided 24x7 support for customers requiring immediate response in a zero-failure environment.  Established remanufacturing process of whole blood analyzers  and cell counters for resale and introduced process efficiencies in a transplanted multi-layer circuit board and module repair department.
positions.title: Clinical Laboratory Equipment Specialist
